column4: Hello. I am trying to get my microphone working under ubuntu 8.04. I can't record anything in Audacity. I have enable everything in Alsamixer/Capture. Is it possible to get it to work?
It may just be very quiet.  I found I had to turn my gain all the way up and enable +7dB boost to get my microphone working.
I have enabled mic boost in audio pref too. I hit him pretty hard, I don't think it is only quiet. Have you ever suceed to record with a mic in ubuntu?
Yes, I've used Skype a few times.
